overview: Hello. This is experienced full stack developer in building web application. As a senior developer, I have build, managed and lead web application dev team, developing eCommerce, social applications, Front-end and Smart-contract of Blockchain applications like NFT and DEX. So I am well-versed in React, TypeScript, Node.js, Unity and even Solidity. I have good passion to search for way to improve my skillset and trying to improve and expand my skillsets as time goes by. Regards!

description: Provided technical direction and system architecture for 40+ individual initiatives.

Wrote 200+ unit tests to ensure 100% of code within SDLC was without bugs.
